WRITING.TEXT: On the last proper Universe Mode I done, Cena was in a feud with the Authority for months on end. The final straw was at WrestleMania when he got screwed out of the WWE Title against Reigns in a #8220;Title vs Career #8221; match. Considering how the match ended (McMahon, HHH and Stephanie interfering and a dodgy official) he feels he deserves to stay and wants revenge in the biggest way possible - - Take control of the entire company for himself #8220;for the good of the business #8221;.
By all means! The more the merrier #128077;
